document.description: This is a 5-sentence news story about alleged White House gunman Robert Pickett.
document.name: Pickett

lexUnit.definition: COD: causing or able to cause death.

sentence.text: ` Mr Kinnock and Mr Ashdown are preparing for Britain a deadly political cocktail .
